channel.title: Jquery on The Plone Expanse
channel.description: Recent content in Jquery on The Plone Expanse

item.title: Problem with jQuery version 1.2.2 and getJSON
item.description: It took me a couple of hours to track this (I was just starting a new project using jQuery), but I finally nailed it: jQuery version 1.2.2 has a problem with loading JSON data from absolute urls. Use the trunk version and you'll be fine.
